title: [LAUNCH BLOCKER] Fix WebSocket Reconnection & Session Recovery
description:
WebSocket drops are losing user context and messages.

## Problem
- WebSocket disconnect = lost messages
- No automatic reconnection with backoff
- Session state not persisted
- Users lose typing context on refresh

## Requirements
1. Exponential backoff reconnection (1s, 2s, 4s, 8s, max 30s)
2. Session ID persistence in localStorage
3. Message queue for offline sends
4. Reconnect indicator in UI
5. Sync missed messages on reconnect

## Files
- src/dashboard/react-components/hooks/useWebSocket.ts
- src/daemon/server.ts

title: [LAUNCH BLOCKER] Rate Limiting & Abuse Prevention
description:
No rate limiting = vulnerable to abuse and cost explosion.

## Requirements
1. API rate limiting per user/IP
2. Message rate limiting (prevent spam)
3. Agent spawn rate limiting
4. WebSocket connection limits
5. Graceful degradation under load

## Implementation
- Redis-based rate limiter
- Sliding window algorithm
- Different limits per plan tier
- 429 responses with Retry-After header

## Limits (Free Tier)
- 100 API requests/minute
- 30 messages/minute
- 5 agent spawns/hour
- 3 concurrent WebSocket connections

title: [LAUNCH BLOCKER] CSRF & Security Headers

- Graceful degradation on DB issues
